abstract: In country after country, Facebook is cementing itself as the social networking leader.
snippet: In country after country, Facebook is cementing itself as the social networking leader.
lead_paragraph: Sergey Brin, a Google founder, takes issue with people who say Google has failed to gain a foothold in social networking. Google has had successes, he often says, especially with Orkut, the dominant service in Brazil and India.

headline.main: Facebook Makes Headway Around the World

abstract: Facebook, the social network service that started in a Harvard dorm room just six years ago, is growing at a dizzying rate around the globe, surging to nearly 500 million users, from 200 million users just 15 months ago, writes The New York Times’s Miguel Helft.
snippet: Facebook, the social network service that started in a Harvard dorm room just six years ago, is growing at a dizzying rate around the globe, surging to nearly 500 million users, from 200 million users just 15 months ago, writes The New York Times’...
lead_paragraph: Sergey Brin, a Google founder, takes issue with people who say Google has failed to gain a foothold in social networking. Google has had successes, he often says, especially with Orkut, the dominant service in Brazil and India.

headline.main: Facebook Makes Headway Around the World

abstract: The skies are clear and the conference center bustling as the annual Allen & Company media retreat enters its second day. And the executives are on hand for the yearly ritual of schmoozing with their fellow moguls.
snippet: The skies are clear and the conference center bustling as the annual Allen & Company media retreat enters its second day. And the executives are on hand for the yearly ritual of schmoozing with their fellow moguls.
lead_paragraph: SUN VALLEY, Idaho — The skies are clear and the conference center is bustling here, as the annual Allen & Company media retreat enters its second day. And the executives — from Rupert Murdoch to Henry R. Kravis to Warren E. Buffett — are on hand for the yearly ritual of schmoozing with their fellow moguls.

headline.main: Live From Sun Valley, Day Two
